channel.title: RabbitMq on 打工人日记
channel.description: Recent content in RabbitMq on 打工人日记

item.title: RabbitMq安装部署
item.description: RabbitMq-Windows版本部署 软件下载 otp_win64_R16B03-1.exe rabbitmq-server-3.6.9.exe 软件安装一路下一步，全部使用默认地址 启动服务 进入C:\Program Files (x86)\RabbitMQ Server\rabbitmq_server-3.4.1\sbin目录，运行cmd，输入命令rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management： C:\Program Files\RabbitMQ Server\rabbitmq_server-3.6.9\sbin> rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management The following plugins have been enabled: amqp_client cowlib cowboy rabbitmq_web_dispatch rabbitmq_management_agent rabbitmq_management Applying plugin configuration to rabbit@DESKTOP-I1CQLLJ... started 6 plugins. C:\Program Files\RabbitMQ Server\rabbitmq_server-3.6.9\sbin> 其他 相关命令： 停止：net stop RabbitMQ 启动：net start RabbitMQ 在浏览器中输入地址查看：http://127.0.0.1:15672/ 使用默认账号登录：guest/ guest

item.title: RabbitMq安装部署
item.description: RabbitMq-Windows版本部署 软件下载 otp_win64_R16B03-1.exe rabbitmq-server-3.6.9.exe 软件安装一路下一步，全部使用默认地址 启动服务 进入C:\Program Files (x86)\RabbitMQ Server\rabbitmq_server-3.4.1\sbin目录，运行cmd，输入命令rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management： C:\Program Files\RabbitMQ Server\rabbitmq_server-3.6.9\sbin> rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management The following plugins have been enabled: amqp_client cowlib cowboy rabbitmq_web_dispatch rabbitmq_management_agent rabbitmq_management Applying plugin configuration to rabbit@DESKTOP-I1CQLLJ... started 6 plugins. C:\Program Files\RabbitMQ Server\rabbitmq_server-3.6.9\sbin> ##其他 相关命令： 停止：net stop RabbitMQ 启动：net start RabbitMQ 在浏览器中输入地址查看：http://127.0.0.1:15672/ 使用默认账号登录：guest/ guest
